title: Leading airlines worldwide - based on total number of passengers 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
The maximum Number of passengers in millions 203.7 is found at Airlines American and the minimum is found at Air China where Airlines is 110.0.
The difference of Number of passengers in millions between the highest and lowest Airlines is 93.7.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Airlines, and Number of passengers in millions in each Airlines on the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
The maximum Number of passengers in millions 203.7 is found at Airlines American and the minimum is found at Air China where Airlines is 110.0.
The difference of Number of passengers in millions between the highest and lowest Airlines is 93.7.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Airlines, and Number of passengers in millions in each Airlines on the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
There is a difference of 93.7 between the maximum Airlines American and minimum Airlines Air China.
Airlines American is higher than any other Airliness with value 203.7, followed by Delta, and Southwest. Down to Airlines Air China with the lowest value 110.0.
Considered together, the average Number of passengers in millions in all 10 Airliness is roughly 148.8.
Summing up the values of all Airliness, we get total 1488.0.
